sourcesContent:
import Nav from "./Nav" import Footer from "./Footer" import { AnimationOnScroll } from 'react-animation-on-scroll'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import producthome from "./assets/product/producthome.png" import image41 from "./assets/product/image41.png" import image42 from "./assets/product/image42.png" import image43 from "./assets/product/image43.png" import image44 from "./assets/product/image44.png" import image45 from "./assets/product/image45.png" import image47 from "./assets/product/image47.png" import image48 from "./assets/product/image48.png" import image49 from "./assets/product/image49.png" import image50 from "./assets/product/image50.png" import image55 from "./assets/product/image55.png" import LUIS from "./assets/LUIS.svg" import "animate.css/animate.min.css"; export default function Products() { return (

Savant.

Savant is a platform where students can learn from shareable virtual reality content, created by teachers using MetaWeaver, our software for building virtual learning environments.

Start

Put on your headset and immerse yourself into the educational world of Savant!

Discover

Explore the Savant Lobby with various lessons and realties. Choose our desired enviornment and jump into the world!

Survey

Once the learning experience is complete, the student will have the ability to rate the course and leave feedback for the course creator. This will encourage the free exchange of information regarding improvements that the course creator can then tailor with our MetaWeaver tool.

Customize

Our platform will be dynamic, constantly providing new information, experiences, and recommendations based on what the students has accessed and common trends that the platform has learned.

Unlimited environments to discover, explore, and learn from.

Astronomy

Zoom through the vastness of space and explore the planets, stars, and galaxies within the universe.

Chemistry

Experiment and study the molecular phenomena of chemicals safely and without restriction.

Biology

Traverse the diverse forms of life, from the simplest of cells to the most complex of organisms.

Literature

Watch your stories come to life, living them in first person as the plot unfolds.

History

Explore the past by traveling back through time.

Art

Discover new and currentmediums for art in 3D, and learn about its past.

Platform Overview

Savant is the platform we created for educators and students to experience and share learning environments. While the content is being created using our MetaWeaver tool, Savant is the central location where students can access learning content, building their library by downloading lessons straight from the cloud. This would allow for compatibility with every current VR headset, and reduce barriers to entry.



Within Savant’s lobby, or “landing page”, students will have access to their personalized content plan powered by our machine learning algorithm. They will also be able to see top courses for the day according to their geographic location, what courses are trending, on a virtual board that is posted within their own instance of the lobby. This lobby will be standard for all users at first, and future product development will work on hosting custom lobbies for each user that joins the platform.



Once the world is loaded, students will be able to experience the lesson and navigate through different worlds, whether it be Rome exploring their history course, a science lab discovering new compounds in chemistry, or in outer space learning about the solar system. Students will no longer be confined to a classroom, and instead can fully immerse themselves in learning new skills and information pertinent to their studies and learning goals.

); }
